io.druid.query

Class Druids.SearchQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.query.Druids.SearchQueryBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Druids

    public static class Druids.SearchQueryBuilder
extends Object
    A Builder for SearchQuery. Required: dataSource(), intervals(), dimensions() and query() must be called before build() Optional: filters(), granularity(), and context() can be called before build() Usage example: 
    
   SearchQuery query = Druids.newSearchQueryBuilder()
                                  .dataSource("Example")
                                  .dimensions(listofEgDims)
                                  .query(exampleQuery)
                                  .intervals("2012-01-01/2012-01-02")
                                  .build();
    See Also:
    SearchQuery
